original_text: It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle than for someone who is rich to enter the kingdom of God.”
korean_text: 낙타가 바늘귀로 나가는 것이 부자가 하나님의 나라에 들어가는 것보다 쉬우니라 하시니

sentences.original_text: It is easier for a camel
to go through the eye of a needle
than for someone who is rich
to enter the kingdom of God
